description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Curry,Pescatarian,Low salt,Prawn,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Tomato
name: Prawn Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g green prawns, peeled, tails intact, deveined

recipeInstructions.text: Place prawns in a bowl with garlic, ginger, spices, 2 tablespoons of the oil. Season with salt and pepper. Stir well. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes to marinate.
Meanwhile, cook rice following packet instructions. Transfer to a bowl and cover to keep warm.
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add the prawns and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until lightly golden.

Transfer to a plate and set aside. Add remaining oil to pan and reduce heat to medium. Add onion and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes until softened. Stir in tomato, cover, and simmer for 5 minutes until tomato softens. Return prawns to pan with yoghurt and coriander (reserving some for garnish) and stir for 1 minute to warm. Season curry to taste. Serve prawn curry with rice and garnish with reserved coriander. Note: To devein a prawn, use a small sharp knife to make a slit along the middle of the back to expose the dark vein, use your fingers to carefully pull the vein through the opening at the head end to remove.
